title: not interesting like as similar other complexs
review: generally except two big size text tile which were too beautiful other items were normal and available in all similar shops . i should mention i purchased a few item which later in Delhi i found the real prices were almost half of what we had paid . if you want to buy something deal with 50 percent discount at least . not recommended but if you have extra time can be visited .

title: Family Tour
review: The items are really good & beautiful, but the price is too high, so i would not recommend in terms of price.

title: search for a taj mahal miniature
review: under the scorching heat of the indian sun, we embarked on our journey to find the prettiest souvenir  of taj mahal in town. our guide took us here.

title: Wonderful work!
review: This place is amazing. It is wonderful what people can do. I do lots of craft work in the UK so I know the value of the work these people do. I had a go at chipping out some  marble ready to receive semi precious stones. The pieces we bought are now in our home, they look beautiful. The same technique was used to decorate the Taj Mahal. Yusuf and all the   people who worked with him are true craft workers. Thank you for sharing your skill.

title: Good, but be firm
review: Like many others, we were also directed here by our cabbie. We went in with a pinch of salt, but ultimately it was good.
